title: Insert Chart Translation Issue in Chinese Context Menu
description: The context menu option 'Insert Chart' is not being translated into Chinese.
OB: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option is displayed in English.
EB: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option should be translated into Chinese.
SR:
1. Open the software and navigate to the layout where you can insert a chart.
2. Right-click on the layout to open the context menu.
3. Observe that the 'Insert Chart' option is displayed in English instead of Chinese.
